name: Vitamin C Brightening & Glow Body Lotion
description: Neutriherbs Vitamin C Brightening & Glow Body Lotion is infused with the goodness of Vitamin C, Ferulic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, and natural plant extracts to brighten and hydrate your skin, leaving it glowing and radiant.

name: 15% Vitamin C + Hyaluronic Acid Serum
description: This powerful Vitamin C serum combines 15% pure Vitamin C with Hyaluronic Acid to brighten the skin, fade dark spots, and provide deep hydration for a glowing complexion.

name: Vitamin C Brighten & Glow Cleanser
description: This gentle yet effective cleanser is enriched with Vitamin C to cleanse, brighten, and rejuvenate your skin, removing impurities while preserving natural moisture.

name: Retinol Cream For Acne & Anti Aging
description: Our advanced Retinol cream targets fine lines, wrinkles, and acne with a powerful formula that promotes skin renewal and collagen production for smoother, clearer skin.

name: Vitamin C Brighten & Glow Body Wash
description: Infused with pure Vitamin C, this luxurious body wash cleanses while brightening and evening your skin tone for a radiant all-over glow.

name: Argan Oil Body Lotion With Shea Butter
description: This richly moisturizing body lotion combines nourishing Argan Oil and Shea Butter to deeply hydrate and revitalize dry, dull skin.

name: Vitamin C Glow Body Oil
description: This lightweight, quick-absorbing body oil is enriched with Vitamin C and natural oils to hydrate, brighten, and enhance your skin's natural glow.

name: Vitamin C Turmeric Exfoliating Glow Body Scrub
description: This invigorating body scrub combines Vitamin C and Turmeric with natural exfoliants to buff away dead skin cells, revealing smoother, brighter skin.
